```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
Shared = read.csv("Shared.txt")
#add row 100000000, 429.183717

Shared = rbind(Shared, c(100000000, 429.183717))
#rename columns
colnames(Shared) = c("Size", "Time")
Shared 

```

```{r}
#plot the data
Shared %>%
  group_by(Size) %>%
  summarise(Time = mean(Time),
            n = n()) %>%
  arrange(n) 

Shared %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = Size, y = Time)) + geom_point() + geom_smooth() 


lm(Time ~ Size, data = Shared) %>% summary()

```
